detail_desc: Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in airy, striped jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared, jersey-lined skirt.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in airy, striped jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared, jersey-lined skirt.
Trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake welt back pockets and slim legs.

Blouse in a softly draping jacquard weave with a collar, covered buttons down the front and a double-layered, gathered yoke front and back. Long balloon sleeves, wide cuffs with a covered button, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Large earrings in metal decorated with plastic beads. Length 6 cm.
One pair of hoop earrings and two hair clips in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length of earrings 2.5 cm, length of hair clips 7 cm and 7.5 cm.
Long-sleeved body in lace with a deep V-neck front and back and concealed silicone trim at the shoulders. Lower section in jersey with press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the front.
Short thin metal chain necklace decorated with shimmering plastic beads. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
Short thin metal chain necklace decorated with shimmering plastic beads. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
Short dress in velour with a yoke and long sleeves in mesh. Round neckline, an opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on the shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on the shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on the shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Calf-length dress woven in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with a soft shimmer. V-neck, a small stand-up collar with ties at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined.
Dance leotard in glossy jersey with crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Glittery elasticated waistband and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.
Leg warmers in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads.

Pyjamas in a soft, airy fine knit. Top with a print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and an elasticated hem with a decorative satin bow. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Dance leggings in microfibre with an elasticated waist.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Pyjama top and shorts in a soft, airy fine knit. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a small print motif above the hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative satin bow at the waist.

Pyjama top and shorts in a soft, airy fine knit. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a small print motif above the hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative satin bow at the waist.
Hoop earrings and a hairclip in metal with shell-shaped decorations. Length of earrings 5 cm, length of hairclip 10 cm.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey in various designs with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes.
Hair clip made from recycled metal in the shape of a snake decorated with artificial pearls and sparkly stones. Size 7 cm.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed trims around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed trims around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Set with a pair of hoop earrings and three hair clips in acetate and metal. Length of earrings 3 cm, length of hair clips 6 cm and 6.5 cm.
Wide dress woven in a viscose blend with a collar, V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Straight-cut with tiers and a flare to the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings with pendants in various designs. Length approx. 2.5 cm.
Metal earrings in various designs decorated with sparkly beads in plastic and glass. One pair of hoops and 24 pairs of studs. Size from 0.2 cm to 4 cm.
Earrings in marbled resin and metal with a hoop pendant. Length 5 cm.
Metal earrings in various designs decorated with sparkly beads in plastic and glass. Two pairs of hoops and 12 pairs of studs. Size from 0.2 cm to 2.5 cm.
Hoop earrings with pendants decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 6.5 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1 cm to 3.1 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1 cm to 3.1 cm.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with a pocket at the top and elastic straps with adjustable fasteners. Seam and belt loops at the waist, a press-stud at the sides and front pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).

Set with two pairs of earrings and three hair clips. One pair of metal hoops and one pair of plastic earrings. Two of the hair clips are decorated with plastic beads. Length of earrings 2.7 cm and 4.3 cm, length of hair clips approx. 7.5 cm-8cm.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length 38-46 cm.
Acetate earrings with rectangular pendants. Length 4.6 cm.
Embossed metal earrings with a round disc at the top and an oval hoop pendant at the bottom. Diameter approx. 2.9 cm, length 6 cm.
Metal rings in various designs. Three of the rings have a plastic stone.
Imitation suede sandals with a small platform and covered heels. Thin straps around the top and a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 1 cm. Heel 9 cm.
Imitation suede sandals with a small platform and covered heels. Thin straps around the top and a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 1 cm. Heel 9 cm.
Long metal earrings with a large hoop pendant. Length 8.5 cm, diameter of pendant 5 cm.
Multi-strand necklace of metal chains, two with pendants. Adjustable length 35-43 cm.
Multi-strand necklace of metal chains, two with pendants. Adjustable length 35-43 cm.

V-neck dress in lightly crinkled, airy chiffon with a foil print, dropped shoulders with gathers at the top, wide sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Narrow, concealed elasticated seam at the waist and a lined skirt with gathers at the top and a flare to the hem.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with gathers at the back and a detachable, soft belt with D-rings. Unlined.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Trenchcoat in airy twill made from a viscose blend with a decorative double-breasted fastening at the front. Notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, a loose yoke at the back and a single back vent. Unlined.
Sun visor in nylon with a lightly padded sweatband and elastication at the back.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in satin with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the top and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Long puff sleeves, cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and pockets in the side seams. Zip fly and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and inset, lace-trimmed mesh section at the top. Long sleeves with a wide lace trim at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved body in soft, patterned, ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back and press-studs at the crotch.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a decorative tie detail at the front of the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in satin with a sheen. Wrapover buttoning at the front. Lined.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with sections in a double layer of woven fabric on the hood and sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with a drawstring, and a taped zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with a mesh section and elastication at the cuffs. Large side pockets with a concealed zip in the side seams. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with sections in a double layer of woven fabric on the hood and sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with a drawstring, and a taped zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with a mesh section and elastication at the cuffs. Large side pockets with a concealed zip in the side seams. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.
Short, A-line dress in mesh with reversible sequins. Low neckline at the back and long sleeves. Jersey lining.
Short dress in cotton denim with wide shoulder straps, buttons down the front, large patch front pockets and a detachable belt with a covered buckle at the waist. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Wrapover V-neck, a concealed zip at the back, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Inset band with pleating at the waist and a flared, softly draping skirt. Partly lined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Wrapover V-neck, a concealed zip at the back, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Inset band with pleating at the waist and a flared, softly draping skirt. Partly lined.

Short dress in sturdy, heavyweight satin. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, seams with decorative gathers and a discreet zip in one side with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Lined.

Short dress in sturdy, heavyweight satin. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, seams with decorative gathers and a discreet zip in one side with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Lined.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck, plastic ring with a hammered metal look at the front and a fastening at the back. Triangular cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Cut-out sections at the back and sides, and medium coverage at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
5-pocket jeans in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
